title: Seikatsu wa Psychopath no Shi no You ni

alternative_titles.en: Life Is the Poem by Psychopath
alternative_titles.ja: 生活はサイコパスの詩のように

synopsis:
One rainy night, a man is murdered in a park and the protagonist witnesses it. He immediately calls the police, but his cell phone battery runs out. As he waits for the battery to recharge, his memory changes…

(Source: Ionian Contemporary Animation Festival)
